entries.meaning: In conformity with applicable rules and regulations.
(uncountable) The act of regulating or the condition of being regulated.
(countable) A law or administrative rule, issued by an organization, used to guide or prescribe the conduct of members of that organization.
examples: Army regulations state a soldier AWOL over 30 days is a deserter.

definitionGroups.group: (law, often in the plural) A type of law made by the executive branch of government, usually by virtue of a statute made by the legislative branch giving the executive the authority to do so.

entries.meaning: (countable, in the singular) A numbered provision within such kind of law.
examples: Regulation 18B of the Defence (General) Regulations 1939 (S.R. & O. 1939/927) authorized the British government to intern suspected spies and collaborators during World War II.

entries.meaning: (European Union law) A form of legislative act which is self-effecting, and requires no further intervention by the Member States to become law.
(medicine) Physiological process which consists in maintaining homoeostasis.
